      public static String getCurrentURL(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      Gets the current page URL and returns it as a string
      Parameters:
      driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
      Returns:
      the URL that's currently open in the current page

    • navigateToURL

      public static void navigateToURL(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, String targetUrl)
      Navigates to targetUrl in case the current URL is different, else refreshes the current page
      Parameters:
      driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
      targetUrl - a string that represents the URL that you wish to navigate to

    • navigateToURLWithBasicAuthentication

      public static void navigateToURLWithBasicAuthentication(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, String targetUrl, String username, String password, String targetUrlAfterAuthentication)

    • navigateToURL

      public static void navigateToURL(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, String targetUrl, String targetUrlAfterRedirection)
      Navigates to targetUrl in case the current URL is different, else refreshes the current page. Waits for successfully navigating to the final url after redirection.
      Parameters:
      driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
      targetUrl - a string that represents the URL that you wish to navigate to
      targetUrlAfterRedirection - a string that represents a part of the url that should be present after redirection, this string is used to confirm successful navigation

    • navigateBack

      public static void navigateBack(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      Navigates one step back from the browsers history
      Parameters:
      driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver

    • navigateForward

      public static void navigateForward(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      Navigates one step forward from the browsers history
      Parameters:
      driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver

      Parameters:
      driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver

      public static void setWindowSize(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, int width, int height)
      Resizes the current window size based on the provided width and height
      Parameters:
      driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
      width - the desired new width of the target window
      height - the desired new height of the target window

      public WebDriverBrowserActions navigateToURL(String targetUrl)

    • navigateToURL

      public WebDriverBrowserActions navigateToURL(String targetUrl, String targetUrlAfterRedirection)
      Navigates to targetUrl in case the current URL is different, else refreshes the current page. Waits for successfully navigating to the final url after redirection.
      Parameters:
      targetUrl - a string that represents the URL that you wish to navigate to
      targetUrlAfterRedirection - a string that represents a part of the url that should be present after redirection, this string is used to confirm successful navigation

      Switches focus to another Tab
      Parameters:

      URL - The name of the URL you want to navigate to

    • switchToWindow

      public static void switchToWindow(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, String nameOrHandle)
      Switches focus to another window
      Parameters:
      driver - the current instance of Selenium webdriver
      nameOrHandle - The name of the window or the handle as returned by ElementActions.getWindowHandle(WebDriver driver)

    • switchToWindow

      public WebDriverBrowserActions switchToWindow(String nameOrHandle)
      Switches focus to another window
      Parameters:
      nameOrHandle - The name of the window or the handle as returned by ElementActions.getWindowHandle(WebDriver driver)
      Returns:
      a self-reference to be used to chain actions
